introduction: APPEXIT is Japan's largest matching platform connecting apps and web services developed by individuals and small teams to their next operators. We do not conduct direct transactions within the platform. Instead, we ensure safe and secure M&A through escrow settlement with physical verification.
missionDescription: Giving valuable products the next chance and sustainable operators. We create a market where the results of craftsmanship are fairly evaluated.
valueItem2: Physical safety verification through escrow settlement
valueItem3: Complete support by dedicated staff until handover
safetyDescription: APPEXIT adopts escrow settlement outside the platform and physically verifies code quality and fund availability to prevent fraud and misconduct. Dedicated staff directly contact both parties and provide complete support until handover.
whatIsDescription: APPEXIT is a matching platform for sellers and buyers. After matching, dedicated staff contact both parties via email and physically verify code quality and fund availability through escrow settlement. The handover proceeds only after safety is confirmed.
whatIsFeature1: Both public and private sale consideration available
whatIsFeature2: Safe information disclosure based on NDA and identity verification
whatIsFeature3: Physical safety verification through escrow settlement before handover
